alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 19 at 6:12AM HST until May 20 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY THROUGH TONIGHT FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... .An upper level low will produce periods of light to moderate snow showers with low visibility. Snow showers should decrease tonight with conditions gradually improving. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow and low visibility. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while driving.
